description: Contains Home Health care plan intervention contact information.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the care plan intervention.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PERFORMED_YN
columns.description:
Care plan intervention contact interventions performed.  Yes or no.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: VARIANCE_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Care plan intervention contact variance code.  Links to category table ZC_VARIANCE_CODE.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other

columns.name: CNCT_SEQUNCE_NUM
columns.description: Care plan intervention contact sequence number.

columns.name: VISITS_DEFERRED_YN
columns.description:
Care plan intervention contact visits deferred.  Yes or no.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PERFORMED_YN

columns.name: CONTACT_NOTES_ID
columns.description: Care plan intervention contact notes ID.

columns.name: DOC_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the source of intervention documentation among multiple platforms. The most recent documentation source will overwrite the previous one if two platforms are used for the same intervention.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Mobile - Android


Mobile - iOS


Remote Client


Hyperspace


Telephony
